description: Creates or updates an Azure Cosmos DB database account.

location.description: The location of the resource group to which the resource belongs.

id.description: The unique resource identifier of the database account.

resource_group_name.description: Name of an Azure resource group.

api_version.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. The current version is 2015-04-08.

create_update_parameters.description: The parameters to provide for the current database account.

kind.description: Indicates the type of database account. This can only be set at database account creation.

name.description: The name of the database account.
